priceTempl.name: Buy me a Coffee
priceTempl.description: Your coffee makes me code 10 times faster, thank you for your support.

priceTempl.name: Gift for me
priceTempl.description: Your mysterious gift was such a surprise, thank you.

priceTempl.name: Donate me Football
priceTempl.description: Wow, I love football the most, thank you for your generosity.

priceTempl.name: Have me a Drink
priceTempl.description: Thanks to your drinks, the summer is no longer hot.
